detail_desc: Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs.
Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in a textured organic cotton knit with a lined hood with ears at the top. Zip down the front with a chin guard, and long raglan sleeves. Lined.
Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in a textured organic cotton knit with a lined hood with ears at the top. Zip down the front with a chin guard, and long raglan sleeves. Lined.

Baby Exclusive. All-in-one suit in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey with buttons at the top and side pockets. Sewn-in turn-up at the cuffs and hems, and concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs.

Baby Exclusive. Fine-knit all-in-one suit in soft organic cotton. Jersey-lined hood with ears on the top, long raglan sleeves and buttons down the front. Opening with buttons down the legs (not in sizes 1-4Y). Jersey lining.
Baby Exclusive. Mittens in soft, textured-knit cotton with decorative appliqués, embroidery and ribbed cuffs. Jersey lining. Size 0-6M without thumbs.
Baby Exclusive. Mittens in soft, textured-knit cotton with decorative appliqués, embroidery and ribbed cuffs. Jersey lining. Size 0-6M without thumbs.
Trousers in soft fleece with an elasticated waist and hems.
Chelsea boots in imitation suede with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Pile linings, fabric insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Chelsea boots in imitation suede with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Pile linings, fabric insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2.5 cm.

Padded jacket in a checked weave containing some wool with a pile collar and zip down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets, an inner pocket with a hook and loop fastening, and an adjustable tab with buttons at the sides. Quilted lining. Polyester filling.
5-pocket jeans in soft stretch denim with a patterned jersey lining, adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud.
Jeans in washed stretch denim with embroidery, an adjustable elasticated waist, fake fly with a press-stud, and side and back pockets. Contrasting colour jersey lining.
Jeans in washed stretch denim with embroidery, an adjustable elasticated waist, fake fly with a press-stud, and side and back pockets. Contrasting colour jersey lining.

Base layer set in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned sections. Top with long raglan sleeves, contrasting colour seams and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with ribbing at the waist and hems. Seamless.

Single-breasted jacket woven in a wool blend with narrow notch lapels and two buttons at the front. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the shoulders and chest, which combined with a gently shaped waist creates a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Suit trousers woven in a stretch wool blend with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and legs with creases. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the thighs and knees to create a comfortable, straight silhouette.
Jersey-lined trousers in cotton twill with embroidery. Elastication and a decorative bow at the waist, side pockets and elasticated hems.
Short-sleeved sports tops in fast-drying functional fabric.
Short, sleeveless dress in textured jersey with a sheen. Stand-up collar, decorative pleats and an opening at the top. Concealed zip at the back, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt.
Jersey-lined corduroy trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and one back pocket.
Jersey-lined corduroy trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and one back pocket.
Jersey-lined corduroy trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and one back pocket.
Polo-neck jumper in a textured knit with ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Polo-neck jumper in a textured knit with ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Polo-neck jumper in a textured knit with ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Lightly padded, thermal jacket with a stand-up collar and detachable hood with a hook and loop fastening. Zip down the front, side pockets and two inner pockets. Reflective details. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif at the top.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif at the top.
Rugby shirt in soft cotton jersey with a woven collar, button placket, print motif at the top and short slits in the sides. Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Slightly longer at the back.
Striped, 3/4-length trousers in a cotton and linen weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Metal chain necklaces, one in thin metal chain with a feather-shaped pendant, the other with a pendant in reconstituted stone. Length 50 cm and 65 cm.
Top in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with short, lace-trimmed sleeves.
Top in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with short, lace-trimmed sleeves.
Top in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with short, lace-trimmed sleeves.
Top in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with short, lace-trimmed sleeves.
Top in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with short, lace-trimmed sleeves.

Padded parka in cotton canvas with a detachable, unlined hood, print motif on the back and stand-up collar. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, flap chest and side pockets with a press-stud, a zipped sleeve pocket, elasticated cuffs and a single back vent. Quilted lining.
Longer, straight-cut jacket in a stretch weave with narrow lapels and no fasteners. Unlined.
Longer, straight-cut jacket in a stretch weave with narrow lapels and no fasteners. Unlined.
Short dress in patterned viscose weave with short sleeves and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Short dress in patterned viscose weave with short sleeves and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Fabric belt with leather details and a metal buckle. Width 3 cm.
Fabric belt with leather details and a metal buckle. Width 3 cm.
Fabric belt with leather details and a metal buckle. Width 3 cm.
Fabric belt with leather details and a metal buckle. Width 3 cm.
Short, pleated circular skirt in woven fabric with a high, smocked waist and decorative drawstring. Unlined.
Short, pleated circular skirt in woven fabric with a high, smocked waist and decorative drawstring. Unlined.
Short, pleated circular skirt in woven fabric with a high, smocked waist and decorative drawstring. Unlined.
Short, pleated circular skirt in woven fabric with a high, smocked waist and decorative drawstring. Unlined.

Padded all-in-one suit in windproof, breathable functional fabric with closed, waterproof seams and a detachable lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Zip down the front with a chin guard, zipped side pockets, and elastication at the cuffs, hems and back of the waist. Reinforced back and legs, and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Reflective details. The suit has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Padded all-in-one suit in windproof, breathable functional fabric with closed, waterproof seams and a detachable lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Zip down the front with a chin guard, zipped side pockets, and elastication at the cuffs, hems and back of the waist. Reinforced back and legs, and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Reflective details. The suit has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Round metal studs. Diameter approx. 3 cm.
Round metal studs. Diameter approx. 3 cm.
Hat in braided paper straw with a grosgrain band. Width of brim approx. 6 cm.
Off-the-shoulder dress in a crinkled, patterned weave with smocking at the top, short sleeves and slits in the sides. Overlocked edges at the top and sleeves. Lined with a short jersey skirt.
Shorts in an airy linen and Tencel™ lyocell blend with a high waist and detachable tie belt. Zip fly, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Trousers in a stretch weave with a slight sheen, sewn-in pleats, and side stripes in a contrasting colour. Fake welt pockets at the back and slits with a concealed zip at the hems.
Shorts in printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Soft brushed inside.

Cropped top in soft pointelle with a V-neck with gathers at the top and narrow, frill-trimmed shoulder straps. Unlined.
Cropped, ribbed top with long sleeves and lacing at the hem.
Cardigan in a soft, fine, patterned knit with long sleeves and no buttons.

Mesh trainers with a padded top edge and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Mesh trainers with a padded top edge and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Off-the-shoulder jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with narrow shoulder straps and long raglan sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and a decorative seam with glittery thread at the side.
